abstract: Many female gallerists strategically dress in stand-out ways to display their status as fashion and culture influencers.
lead_paragraph: On display almost as much as the art itself on Randalls Island, female gallerists use their clothes as the medium.

headline.main: At Frieze Art Fair, Figures at an Exhibition

snippet: On display almost as much as the art itself on Randalls Island, female gallerists use their clothes as the medium.
